meanings.sent1: The tasseling of the curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed tasseling her handmade scarf to give it a decorative finish.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the tasseling of the yarn was a fun game to play with.
meanings.sent4: The tasseling of the trees in the wind looked like nature's own decorations.
meanings.sent5: The tasseling of the flowers in the garden made it look like a colorful paradise.

meanings.sent1: The tasseling of the fabric required careful attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: During the craft project, she learned the art of tasseling with yarn.
meanings.sent3: The tasseling of the hair after a windy day made her look like a wild explorer.
meanings.sent4: The tasseling of the wheat fields signaled a bountiful harvest ahead.
meanings.sent5: The tasseling of the graduation caps marked the end of a significant chapter.

meanings.definition: The stage of growth in corn when the tassels appear.
meanings.sent1: Farmers eagerly awaited the tasseling of the corn as a sign of growth.
meanings.sent2: The tasseling of the corn plants indicated that summer was in full swing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous crow tried to peck at the tasseling of the corn, mistaking it for food.
meanings.sent4: The golden tasseling of the cornfields shimmered under the afternoon sun.
meanings.sent5: The sudden tasseling of the corn took the farmers by surprise, showing rapid progress.
